sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SMAutoAssignment</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Javascript wrapper around SNC.SMAutoassignment that automatically determines property prefix needed</description>
        <name>SMAutoAssignment</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SMAutoAssignment = Class.create();
SMAutoAssignment.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	autodispatch: function(task, location, locationWeight, timeZone, timeZoneWeight, skills, skillsWeight, schedule, followTheSun, priority, estimatedEndWorkFieldName, useConsistentAssignment) {
		return (new SNC.SMAutoassignment((new sn_sm.SMConfiguration()).getPropertyPrefix(task))).autodispatch(task, location, locationWeight, timeZone, timeZoneWeight, skills, skillsWeight, schedule, followTheSun, priority, estimatedEndWorkFieldName, useConsistentAssignment);
	},
	
	getTimeMap: function(task, agentId, scheduleId, rangeStart, rangeEnd, useExpectedTravelTime, useCurrentTask) {
		var propertyPrefix = (new sn_sm.SMConfiguration()).getPropertyPrefix(task);
		return (new SNC.SMAutoassignment(propertyPrefix))
			.getTimeMap(task, agentId, scheduleId, rangeStart, rangeEnd, useExpectedTravelTime, useCurrentTask);
	},
	
	getTimeMapFromSchedule: function(config, agentId, scheduleId, rangeStart, rangeEnd){
		var propertyPrefix = (new sn_sm.SMConfiguration()).getPropertyPrefix(config);
		return (new SNC.SMAutoassignment(propertyPrefix))
			.getTimeMapFromSchedule(agentId, scheduleId, rangeStart, rangeEnd);
	},
	
	getTimeString: function(gdt) {
		return (new SNC.SMAutoassignment()).getTimeString(gdt);
	},
	
	getCandidatesFromAutodispatch: function(task, location, locationWeight, timeZone, timeZoneWeight, skills, skillsWeight, schedule, followTheSun, priority, estimatedEndWorkFieldName, useConsistentAssignment){
		var autoAssignResponse =(new SNC.SMAutoassignment((new sn_sm.SMConfiguration()).getPropertyPrefix(task))).getCandidatesFromAutodispatch(task, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null);
		return j2js(autoAssignResponse.toNative());
	},
	
	
	getCandidatesForAppointmentBooking: function(task){
		var appointmentResponse =(new SNC.SMAutoassignment((new sn_sm.SMConfiguration()).getPropertyPrefix(task))).getCandidatesForAppointmentBooking(task);
		return appointmentResponse;
	},

	getCandidateResponseForAppointmentBooking: function(task){
		var appointmentResponse =(new SNC.SMAutoassignment((new sn_sm.SMConfiguration()).getPropertyPrefix(task))).getCandidateResponseForAppointmentBooking(task);
		return j2js(appointmentResponse.toNative());
	},
	
    type: 'SMAutoAssignment'
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-06-27 21:31:55</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1db61882df212100dca6a5f59bf2633b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SMAutoAssignment</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Management Core" source="com.snc.service_management.core">3e6bd6bb4722c210cd4e1ce4316d4387</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1db61882df212100dca6a5f59bf2633b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-05-09 21:19:31</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
